loans.use: Purchase of fertilizer for her fields

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia tiene 50 años, es casada, tiene 8 hijos, ahora vive con dos D. ellos. DesD. muy niña se ha dedicado a la agricultura, cuando termina sus actividades en el campo se dedica a la artesanía, a elaborar tapices, frazadas, etc. Lo que más le agrada es la agricultura, por ello no deja D. sembrar, y sobre todo ve muy rentable la venta D. papa, esta vez tiene sembrado 20 sacos D. semilla, y en menor cantidad siembra olluco, oca, y otros productos. Pero la papa es por lo que obtiene mayores ganancias. La dificultad es el alza en el precio D. los fertilizantes, sin ellos, sus campos no producen como debería ser. Este es su préstamo nº 7 con MFP, ha venido siendo puntual en todas sus cuotas. Con la cantidad que solicita comprará fertilizantes como el Nitrato, el Potasio y el 18, lo que le costará 1.800 soles, comenta que le faltará para los insecticidas.
texts.en:
Lidia is 50 years old, is married, has 8 children, and now lives with one of them. Since she was a very young girl she has worked in agriculture, when she finishs her activities in the field she works in crafts, making tapestries, blankets, etc. What she likes most is agriculture, which is why she does not stop cultivating, and above all she sees potato sales as very profitable. This time she is planting 20 sacks of seed and in lesser quantities grows "olluco", "oca", and other products. But the potato is for what she obtains greater earnings. The difficulty is the increase in the price of fertilizers and without them her fields do not produce as they should. This is her loan number 7 with MFP, she has been punctual in all of her installmentes.With the quantity that she has requested she will buy fertilizers such as nitrate, potassium and 18, which will cost her 1.800 soles. She comments that she will not have enought to purchase incesticides.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Mrs. Benita R., 57 years old, lives in Upper Dicayas, Dipolog City. Unfortunately her husband, 64 years old, has been seriously ill for almost 20 years, suffering from liver and heart failure. She was gifted with 7 children. Due to their financial crisis, she was able only to send one child to school. That one got a BS-Criminology but the rest of the children didn’t finish their schooling.

Mrs. Benita is the breadwinner for the family. She has experienced hardships, especially in raising her family and also due to her husband’s situation. But life must go on with Mrs. Benita. This industrious woman finds herself plowing the rice field, planting vegetables such as sweet potatos, cassava, peanuts, corn, and bananas and selling “tuba” ( Filipino wine made from coconuts). She also opened a "sari-sari" (little general store) in front of their house, having a start–up capital of only PHP 1,000.

In need of additional working capital, Mrs. Benita decided to join Paglaum Cooperative on November 29, 2005. She has received several loans already and recently requested PHP 14,000 for buying farm and garden fertilizer and paying labor costs for cultivating their land.

Being a MIGS member (Member in Good Standing) of the cooperative, she has been able to manage her income. She is able to pay for the medicine for her ill husband, as well as the daily needs of her family. Mrs. Benitez is very thankful because if it were not for Paglaum, she might not have any savings at all nor be guided properly in her finances. She hopes to own a motorcycle someday to use for transporting her produce.

loans.use: to purchase garden and farm fertilizer and pay labor costs for land cultivation

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es: Maritza tiene 30 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, vive con su esposo, sus hijos y sus padres. Desde niña, con sus padres, ha realizado la actividad de la agricultura, ahora que tiene pequeños niños siente dificultad en hacerlo, su esposo trabaja fuera en una mina, por ello no siembra grandes cantidades como a ella le gustaría, pero de todos modos, así con sus pequeños bajo su responsabilidad, está sembrando con ayuda de sus familiares. Para ella le es muy rentable la agricultura, ha visto por conveniente sembrar papa en mayor cantidad, ya que también siembra olluco, aunque a veces el hielo lo quema y pierde, pero no todas las veces. Lo difícil para ella es que sus hijos están muy pequeños y esto dificulta su trabajo. Este es su 7mo préstamo con MFP, y ha sido puntual en el  pago todas sus cuotas. Con el dinero va comprar guano de corral y fertilizantes químicos para abonar su chacra.
texts.en:
Maritza is 30 years old, is married and has 3 children. She lives with her husband, her children and her parents. Since she was a child she carried out the activity of agriculture with her parents and now that she has small children she feels difficulty doing it. Her husband works away in a mine which is why she does not grow as large of quantities as she would like, but in any case with her little ones as her responsibility, she is growing with the help of her relatives. For her agriculture is very profitable and she has seen it to be convenient to grow potatoes in greater quantities as she also grows "olluco", although sometimes the ice burns it and it is lost, but not always. The difficult thing for her is that her children are very small and this complicates her work. This is her 7th loan with MFP and she has been punctual with the payment of all of her installments. With the money she is going to buy farm manure and chemical fertilizers to fertilize her field.

Translated from Spanish by Aimee Sostowski, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of manure and fertilizers for her crops

loans.name: Benigna

texts.es: Benigna tiene 57 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos. Benigna trabaja desD. hace 29 años en la agricultura y la ganadería, es natural D. Huancayo y siempre ha estado en constante actividad, cultiva productos nativos D. su tierra, en cuanto a tubérculos y granos, D. los cuales ve las ganancias cuando es el tiempo D. la cosecha, ella sabe que se corre muchos riesgos, como por ejemplo la caída D. la helada que muchas veces ha cobrado perdidas en sus cosechas, por ello Benigna también se dedica a la compra y venta D. animales, por lo que obtiene ganancias adicionales, tiene principalmente ovejas, es lo que más venD., para ello las cuida con mucho ahínco para que sus ventas sean  buenas, su principal punto D. venta es la feria ganadera D. Huancayo. Es la segunda vez que Benigna solicita un préstamo con MFP, es una D. las clientas que D. su grupo cumple puntualmente con sus pagos, por lo cual se la ha considerado ser parte D. la renovación D. crédito. Solicita este préstamo con el cual podrá adquirir ovejas y también sacos D. abono para sembrar papa en una D. sus tierras D. cultivo (serán 2 sacos D. abono y una oveja aproximadamente).
texts.en:
Benigna is 57 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. Benigna has worked in agriculture and livestock farming since the age of 29. She is a native of Huancayo and has always been working. She cultivates products that are native to the land, including tubers and grains, from which she earns a lot at harvest time. She knows that she is taking many risks; for example, frost has led to losses in her harvest many times. Because of this, Benigna also buys and sells animals, for which she gets additional earnings. She mostly has sheep because they sell well. As a result, she takes care of them enthusiastically so that her sales will be good. She mostly sells her goods at the cattle fair in Huancayo. This is the second time that Benigna is asking for a loan from MFP. She is one of the clients from her group that complied punctually with her payments. Because of this, she was considered for another loan. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy sheep and sacks of fertilizer to plant potatoes on one of her plots of land (there will be approximately 2 sacks of fertilizer and one sheep).

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer and to increase her quantity of sheep

loans.name: Demitila

texts.es: Demitila tiene 53 años y vive con uno D. sus hijos. Demitila ha trabajado como agricultora toda su vida, tarea que ejercita con mucha dedicación, tal es así que sus extensiones D. terreno hace descansar la tierra durante 3 años, D. esa manera utiliza más abono natural y muy poco del artificial, principalmente cultiva papa y también se dedica a la crianza D. animales. La mayor parte D. su tiempo es invertido en esta actividad, D. ganadería, tiene caballos, burros y toros. Su deseo es también impulsar más la venta D. animales, por lo que está preparando su  establo para ello. Es la quinta vez que Demitila solicita un préstamo en MFP, y ha demostrado ser responsable y puntual en sus pagos. Solicita este préstamo con el que invertirá en la compra D. alimento balanceado para sus animales.
texts.en:
Demitila is 53 years old and lives with one of her children. She has worked in agriculture her whole life. She has done this with a lot of dedication, so much so that the extensions of land have allowed her to let the land lay fallow for 3 years. In this way, she uses more natural fertilizer and less artificial fertilizer. She mostly grows potatoes and also raises animals. Most of her time is invested in livestock farming. She has horses, donkeys, and bulls. Her dream is also to stimulate the sale of animals, because she is preparing her stable for it. This is the fifth time that Demitila has asked for a loan from MFP. She has demonstrated that she is responsible and punctual in her payments. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of a balanced diet for her animals.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy balanced foods for her animals

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel tiene 39 años, vive con su esposa. Desde hace más de 20 años se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura junto a su esposa, salen muy temprano para buscar pastos verdes para sus animales, de esa manera mantenerlos saludables, ya que cada lunes se dedican a la venta de sus ovejas a la feria  ganadera de una localidad cercana a la suya. Para Gabriel esta es la forma de generarse ingresos, cuando espera la cosecha, cultiva tubérculos y granos, nos dice que trabajará en ello hasta que las fuerzas de su cuerpo lo acompañen. En el caso de Gabriel es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo en MFP, sin embargo fue aceptado por los integrantes de su banco comunal porque conocen de su esfuerzo y dedicación. En esta oportunidad solicita un préstamo para comprar abono para la época de siembra que se acerca.
texts.en:
Gabriel is 39 years old and lives with his wife. Since he was older than 20, he has been involved in livestock farming and agriculture with his wife. They go out very early to look for green grass for his animals to keep them healthy, because every Monday they sell their sheep at the cattle fair in a location near them. This is how Gabriel generates income when he waits for the harvest. She grows tubers and grains; she says she will work on this as long as her body allows her to. This is Gabriel’s first loan with MFP. However, he was accepted by the members of the community bank because they know of his strength and dedication. At this time, he is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for the harvest-time that is approaching.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for his fields for cultivation

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a widow. She owns a kiosk that is located at a small market in Melitopol city. She sells men’s clothing. Her working capital is about 10,000 UAH, and the monthly gross revenue amounts to 5,000 UAH. 

Maria has been involved in this business for 15 years already and knows all about it. Being a nice and friendly person, she gives great customer service that provides her with repeated clients. She is very entrepreneurial and always looks for new kinds of goods to sell to the men.

Maria would like to get a loan to buy more stock. The extra supply of clothing will help her to generate more income that she hopes to use for paying her grandson's school tuition.

loans.use: To increase stock

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es: Lorenza tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Ella se ha dedicado a la agricultura durante casi toda su vida, ya que es proveniente D. una familia netamente ganadera y agricultora, es así que constantemente siembra habas, trigo, oca, olluco; por épocas D. siembra y cuando llega la cosecha la lleva a Huancayo a vender. También se dedica a la crianza D. animales como la vaca, cerdos y ovejas. Esta muy satisfecha con la labor que realiza, además D. ser la herencia y legado que le dejaron sus padres. Persevera a pesar D. que en muchas oportunidades las condiciones del clima y las bajas temperaturas ocasionaran perdidas en sus cosechas. Es la quinta vez que Lorenza solicita un préstamo en MFP, es una D. las clientas que ha demostrado ser  fiel y responsable en sus cuotas. Solicita este préstamo para la siembra la papa, comprará sacos D. abono para preparar su tierra para la semilla.
texts.en:
Lorenza is 48 years old and lives with her husband and three children. She has worked in agriculture for almost her whole life, since she comes from a cattle-raising and agriculture family. Because of this, she always plants broad beans, wheat, oca and olluco (tubers indigenous to Peru). For sowing times and when the harvest arrives, she brings it to Huancayo to sell her goods. She also raises animals like cows, pigs, and sheep. She is very satisfied with the work that she does, in addition to it being the inheritance and legacy that her parents left her. She perseveres in spite of the fact that at many times the weather conditions and low temperatures caused losses in her harvest. This is the fifth time that Lorenza has asked for a loan from MFP. She is one of the clients that has proven to be loyal and responsible in her repayments. She is requesting this loan to sow potatoes. She will also buy sacks of fertilizer to prepare her land for the seeds.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer to cultivate potatoes

loans.name: Melania

texts.es: Melania tiene 48 años, vive con su esposo y sus hijos. Se dedica desD. hace 20 años a la agricultura, es natural del mismo lugar donD. vive, es así que todos los días ella y su familia trabajan intensamente en el cuidado D. sus animales,  llevándolos a pastizales, el trayecto les toma 2 horas D. duro caminar, ya casi al anochecer regresan para guardarlos en su establo y descansar. Cuando es época D. siembra la tarea del campo se torna más dura, por lo que hasta los más pequeños D. su casa apoyan en esta labor, el cultivo principal para Melania son los tubérculos y granos como la papa, oca, olluco, cebada, arveja, etc. ella utiliza el arado con los 2 toros que tiene, D. esa manera garantiza el sostenimiento D. su familia. Para Melania es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo en MFP, es una mujer cumplidora en sus pagos, por lo que se la consideró en esta renovación D. crédito. Solicita este préstamo con el cual comprará sacos D. abono para preparar la tierra D. cultivo que posee.
texts.en:
Melania is 48 years old and lives with her husband and their children. She has worked in agriculture since the age of 20. She is a native of the same place that she lives, so every day she and her family work hard caring for animals and taking them to the pastures. The route takes them 2 hours to walk; it is almost nightfall when they return to put the animals in their stable and to rest. When it is sowing time, the farm work takes more time. As a result, even the youngest children help with this work. The main crops for Melania are the tubers and grains, like potatoes, oca, olluco, barley, peas, etc. She uses the plow with the 2 bulls that she has. In this way, she guarantees the sustenance of her family. This is Melania’s second loan from MFP. She is a woman who is compliant in her payments. Because of this, she was considered for another loan. She is requesting this loan so that she can buy sacks of fertilizer to prepare her land for the crops that she has.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buys sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Rebeca

texts.es: Rebeca tiene 28 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a la agricultura y a la ganadería, desde ese entonces ha visto que le va muy bien cultivando papa, cebada, olluco, oca y mashua. Ella y toda su familia colaboran en la siembra y también en la cosecha, que luego es vendida al por mayor en el mercado mayorista de Huancayo. Mientras todavía espera la cosecha (dura  6 meses aproximadamente) ella y su esposo crían animales, los cuales venden en el mercado ganadero de su zona, aunque el esfuerzo físico sea bien intenso, Rebeca no descansa hasta que sus animales estén bien atendidos, ya que de ello dependerá la ganancia para educar a sus hijos. Es la segunda vez que solicita un préstamo en MFP, ha demostrado ser puntual, razón de lo que fue aceptada para renovar su crédito. Solicita este préstamo con el que podrá aprovechar la época de siembra preparando su tierra con sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Rebeca is 28 years old and lives with her husband and 2 children. Since her childhood, she has worked in agriculture and cattle-raising. Since then, she has seen that she does well growing potatoes, barley, olluco, oca, and mashua (tubers grown in Peru). She and her family work together on sowing and also on the harvest. The goods are later sold at the wholesale market in Huancayo. While they are waiting for the harvest, which lasts approximately 6 months, she and her husband raise animals, which are sold at the cattle market in her area. Although this requires hard physical labor, Rebeca doesn’t rest until her animals are well taken care of, since she depends on the earnings to educate her children. This is the second time that she has asked for a loan from MFP. She has demonstrated that she is punctual, which is the reason that she was accepted to take out another loan. She requests this loan so that she can take advantage of the sowing time by preparing her land with sacks of fertilizer.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to prepare her land

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
El Sr. Marco Antonio V. vive en la Localidad de El Torno desde hace 5 años aproximadamente, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos pequeños, actualmente se dedica al negocio del internet, siendo propietario de un cibercafé y un punto de llamadas. Negocio que le permite mantener a su familia.
Su esposa es dueña de otro punto de llamadas, es una persona muy trabajadora y con ganas de seguir adelante, su objetivo es llegar a agrandar su negocio y comprar más computadoras, para poder sacar profesionales a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mr. Marco Antonia V. has lived in the city of El Torno for approximately 5 years. He owns his home, and lives there with his wife and three small children. Marco is in the internet business, as he owns an internet and long-distance phone cafe. This business allows Marco to support his family. Marco's wife owns a separate phone cafe, and is a hard working person, who has a desire to succeed. Marcos' goal is to expand his business and purchase more computers so that he can help his children become professionals.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase computers

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a member of the Dos Mil (“Two thousand”) Village Bank. She is 46 years old and married with three children. Maria runs an Internet café from her home. She also sells cosmetics by catalog and sells seasonal decorations for Christmas, Carnaval and Peruvian Independence Day, which she sells from a cart in Ayacucho’s main plaza. 

Maria is requesting a loan of 1000 soles to bring Christmas decorations in from Lima (a 9 hour bus ride from Ayacucho) to sell. 

Maria would eventually like to open up a store of her own to sell lots of different things. She plans to use the money she has saved at FINCA to open the store. She has been working with FINCA for about five years; her house was built with FINCA savings.

loans.use: Buy Christmas decorations

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La señora Silvia vive en casa propia en la calle Alberto Ostria de la zona de Tembladerani de la ciudad de La Paz; ella trabajaba en una empresa en el departamento de Pando, debido a problemas surgidos en nuestro País ella se vino a La Paz e instaló un Snack en su domicilio, lugar donde se encuentra una parada de minibuses. El lugar es ideal para  la venta de sándwiches y almuerzos y así ha incrementado su clientela.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar mas insumos (carne, papas, vegetales, carnes frias, etc.), mantener su clientela y a la vez mejorar sus ingresos.

Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito a través de  Impro, via Kiva, y la actividad  que desarrolla y el carácter social del crédito  hacen que pueda acceder a solicitar un préstamo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Silvia owns her home on Alberto Ostria street, in the Tembladerani area, in the city of La Paz. She used to work for a company in the city of Pando, but due to problems within the country, she moved to La Paz and opened a convenience store in her home, which happens to be near a bus stop. This location is perfect for selling sandwiches and lunches, and has therefore has been able to increase her client base. The loan that she is requesting will used to purchase food (meat, potatoes, vegetables, cold meats, etc), maintain her client base, and increase her income. This is the first time that she is asking for a loan through Impro and Kiva, and is thankful for to be able to access a loan like this.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase food to use in the the production of the sandwiches that she sells

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
En el municipio de Nagarote de la ciudad de León la señora Martha Lorena C. se dedica con gran esfuerzo a su negocio de venta de comida específicamente se destaca en la venta de carne de cerdo el cual comercializa en su casa de habitación en su municipio.

La labor de esta dama es muy fuerte por la razón de que tiene el deber de comprar los cerdos luego los destaza, prepara la carne y una vez que todo está listo comercializa la carne y a la vez prepara alimentos para su venta. Todo esto lo hace con el propósito de mantener su núcleo familiar compuesto por sus dos hijos en edades escolares. Por este motivo espera que su crédito sea otorgado para continuar con sus esfuerzos en la actividad económica que se dedica en su municipio.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Nagarote in the city of León, Mrs. Martha Lorena C. sells food, especially pork, which she sells out of her home. Martha runs a very good business, as she first purchases the meat, later cleans and prepares it, and once it is ready, sells the meat as well as uses it in other dishes. Martha does all of this so that she can support her family, which is comprised of her two school-aged children. Because of this, she hopes to receive the loan and to continue her efforts in her food sales business.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase pigs

loans.name: Gudnnar

texts.es:
El señor Gudnnar vive en anticrítico en la calle Feliciano Kantuta de la zona de tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz , su actividad es la de ensamblaje de computadoras, instalación de juegos en red, con este trabajo él sustenta su alimentación y sus estudios ya que sus padres viven en el extranjero.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar una computadora que le sirva para crear y configurar  software y de esta manera ofrecer mejores productos a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos.


Es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO y también de Kiva. El análisis socio-económico indica que Gudnnar está en condiciones de repagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Mr. Gudnnar lives on Feliciana Kantuta street in the Tacagua area in the city of La Paz. He works in the computer business, including assembly and internet installation, and with this job supports himself while he continues to study, as his parents live out of the country. The loan that he is requesting will be used to purchase a computer that he can use to create software and in this way offer better products to his clients, and increase his income. This is the first time Mr. Gudnnar is asking for a loan through IMPRO and Kiva. The socio-economic analysis indicates that Gudnnar will be able to repay the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a computer to create software to sell.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: La señora Alicia, de 53 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive junto con su único hijo que es soltero, trabaja y la apoya en todo. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida dentro de su vivienda desde hace un año y medio, esta actividad la realiza durante todo el día, ya que vende desayuno, almuerzo y cena. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que  cuenta con el apoyo de su hijo, quien le ayuda mucho, además conoce a mucha gente, por lo que le gusta que las personas degusten de su buena sazón. Le es rentable su negocio porque cuenta con una buena clientela desde hace mucho tiempo. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP. Con la cantidad solicitada quiere comprar mesas, sillas y ambientar mejor su local.
texts.en:
Alicia, age 53, is a single mother, and lives with her only son who is single, works, and supports her in everything. She has been selling food from her home for a year and a half, this activity is what she does during the day since she sells breakfast, lunch and dinner. What she likes most about her work is that she is able to count on the support of her son, who helps her a lot. In addition she meets many people and it pleases her when people enjoy her good cooking. Her business is profitable because she has had a good clientele for a long time. This is her first loan with MFP. With the amount requested she wants to buy tables, chairs, and improve the atmosphere of her shop.

Translated from Spanish by Kristy Placido, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Jose Felix

texts.en:
Jose Felix is a member of the Generosidad (Generosity) Village Bank. He is 37 years old and lives alone in a room he rents in the city of Ayacucho. Jose sells baby clothes in bulk. He buys the clothes in Lima, and then sells them in Ayacucho and in other cities and towns all across Peru. He travels by bus with his wares from town to town; when he is in Ayacucho, he sells clothing from a space in his cousin’s shoe store.

Jose is requesting a loan of $975 (4,000 soles) to buy more clothing to sell during the Christmas season, when his sales usually double. This is Jose Felix’s fourth loan with the Generosidad Village Bank. His dream for the future is to open a store of his own in Ayacucho.

loans.use: Buy baby clothes wholesale to resell

loans.name: Araceli

texts.es: Araceli, de 29 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos que están estudiando, vive con su conviviente, quien la apoya en todo. Ella es propietaria de dos botes motores que se dedican al transporte de pasajeros hasta el caserío de Atalaya (1 día y una noche de viaje río abajo del Ucayali), estos botes son administrados por ella misma, esta labor la viene realizando desde hace 6 años atrás. Le es muy rentable porque no existe mucha competencia laboral y le proporciona buenos ingresos que le ayudaron a mejorar su nivel de vida, por lo que le va muy bien. Este es su 9no préstamo con MFP, ha sido puntual en todos sus pagos. Esta vez quiere mandar a construir otro bote motor, y dirigir el trasporte para otros caseríos.
texts.en:
Araceli, age 29, has three children who are in school, and lives with her husband who supports her in everything she does. She is the owner of two motor boats that transport passengers to the village of Atalaya (One day and one night trip downriver from Ucayali). She runs the boats herself, and this work has now been realized after six years. The business is very profitable because there isn't much competition for work and it brings in good income that help her to improve her life, which is going very well for her. This is her ninth loan with MFP and she has been punctual with all of her payments. This time she wants to order the construction of another motor boat and direct the transport to other towns.

Translated from Spanish by Kristy Placido, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Build another motor boat

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El señor Juan vive en casa propia en la calle Alberto Ostria de la zona de tembladerani de la ciudad de la Paz;  trabaja  como chofer con su auto durante la noche y su esposa trabaja como empleada en una limpieza, en la misma limpieza donde trabaja la esposa Juan está contratado durante el día  para dejar la ropa en las diferentes agencias y al mismo tiempo recogerlas; por este trabajo percibe un salario de Bs. 600.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar llantas para su taxi y mantener activa su herramienta de trabajo. 

Es cliente de Impro desde el año 2004 y su actividad le permite acceder a un nuevo crédito.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan owns his own home on Alberto Ostria street in the area of Tembladerani in the city of La Paz. He works as a chauffeur with his care at night, and his wife works in a dry-cleaning business. This same dry-cleaners hires Juan to deliver and collect clothing to and from the various agencies around town. Juan earns a salary of Bs. 600 from this job. The loan that Juan is requesting will be used to purchase tires for his taxi, and to maintain it. Juan has been working with Impro since 2004, and his job permits him to request another loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase wheels for a taxi

loans.name: Urcad 1 Group

texts.fr: L'Ecovillage de keur Goumak (http://www.sem-fund.org/keurgumaggfr.php) situé dans la région de diourbel se particularise par l'absences d'infrastructures industrielles. Quand on sait que les conséquences de la désertification n'épargnent plus aucune couche sociale de la région qui est une zone rurale. C'est pourquoi,pour sauvegarder la bonne continuité de nos activités, nous les femmes de Urcad ayant bénéficié d'un premier prêt, viennent encore solliciter un renouvellement de prêt.  Comme le nombres de personnes a augmenté dans le groupement, il est maintenant scindé en 02 groupes dont le groupe Urcad 1 faisant la transformation de fruits-légumes-céréales et l'autre groupe Urcad 2 faisant les activités de teinture
texts.en:
The ecovillage of keur Goumak (http://www.sem-fund.org/keurgumaggfr.php), located in the region of Diourbel, stands out because of its absence of industrial infrastructure. We all know that the consequences of desertification do not spare any social class of the region which is a rural zone. This is why, to safeguard the good stability of our activities, we, the women of Urcad having received a first loan, are coming to request a renewal of loan. Since the number of group members has increased, the group has now been split up in 2 groups. Urcad 1 is in charge of the transformation of fruits-vegetables-cereals, the other group Urcad 2 is in the business of color dye.


Translated from French by Véronique Fourment, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of raw material to transform cereals, fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Basti

texts.es: Su dedicación a la venta de productos de belleza lo hace por su hijo. La señora Basti es consultora de belleza de una línea cosmética por catálogo muy conocida a nivel nacional, ella vende estos productos por los diferentes alrededores de la ciudad de Pucallpa, así como también es la encargada de buscar personas que quieren trabajar con ella en la venta de estos productos. Esta labor la realiza desde hace 2 años, y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que conoce mucha gente, le es rentable porque cuenta con una clientela selecta, por lo que le va muy bien. A razón de que tiene un negocio rentable, quiere comprar más de estos productos,  así como también adquirir una vitrina para mostrarlos y que estén protegidos.
texts.en:
She makes her living selling beauty products for the sake of her son. Mrs. Basti is a beauty consultant for a well-known national line of catalog cosmetics. She sells these products in different areas of the city of Pucallpa, as well as finding persons who want to work for her selling the products. She has been doing this for two years, and what she likes about her work is meeting so many people. It is profitable because she deals with a select clientele, so it is going well for her. Because she has a profitable business, she wants to buy more products, as well as to acquire a display case to both protect and display them.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To purchase a larger quantity of beauty products as well as a display case to display them

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
El señor Vicente es nacido en la ciudad de Sucre, Bolivia. Actualmente vive en la localidad de La Guardia, en el departamento de Santa Cruz, Bolivia, vive en la casa de sus suegros con su esposa y sus hijos. Se dedica a la albañilería desde hace 5 años, actividad que proporciona el sustento a su familia, es por ello que en esta ocasión el señor vicente, solicita el crédito, que utilizará para la compra de herramientas, que le ayudarán a una mejor y más eficiente realización de su trabajo. Paralelamente podemos indicar que su esposa se dedica a las labores del hogar,sin embargo y gracias a los créditos que ha recibido su esposo, quiere empezar con el negocio de la venta de refrescos en el mercado, de manera ambulante por ello parte del crédito será destinado a la compra de herramientas y un pequeño porcentaje será destinado a la compra de gaseosas; con ello don vicente ayudará también a impulsar el negocio de su señora.
El objetivo que ambos se han trazado, es iniciar un negocio para su esposa, que este ubicado en las cercanías del Mercado, para asó ambos aportar económicamente al desarrollo del hogar y de algún modo tener mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Señor Vicente was born in Sucre, Bolivia. He is currently living in La Guardia, Santa Cruz Department, Bolivia. He lives in the home of his in-laws with his wife and children. He has been engaged in bricklaying for 5 years, providing support for his family.

The loan that Señor Vicente has solicited will be used to purchase tools that will help him increase the efficiency of his bricklaying business. His wife works at home, and with the help of microlending, she would also like to start a business in conjunction with her husband selling soft drinks in the market as a street vendor. Because of this, a small portion of his loan will also be used for the purchase of soft drinks, and this will help to empower his wife.

Their mutual objective is to have a business near the Market in order to improve their life circumstances--they already have part of the capital they need.

Translated from Spanish by Michelle Kreger, Kiva Staff

loans.use: To purchase tools and soft drinks for sale

loans.name: William

texts.es:
El señor William vive en casa de los suegros en la Av. Buenos Aires de la zona Gran Poder de la ciudad de La Paz, tiene 21 años de edad y vive con su esposa e hijo; trabaja con un taxi que obtuvo con sus ahorros, la esposa trabaja para su madre en un Punto Cotel (punto de atención con servicio de llamadas telefonicas) donde percibe un salario de Bs. 300.-. 

El crédito que solicita es para la compra de tarjetas telefónicas Pre-Pago, CDs, Baterías, Cargadores de Celulares, ya que la madre de su esposa le dio un lugar en el punto Cotel a manera de ayudarlos para que puedan mejorar sus ingresos.

A manera de aclaración, Cotel es una de las  Compañías de Telefonos que operan en Bolivia, y que ofrecen especie de franquicias a pequeños empresarios que desean instalar servicios de llamadas telefónicas al público en general.

Esta es la primera vez que William solicita un crédito a través de Kiva. El anális de su flujo de Caja muestra que tiene la capacidad de pagar la deuda.
texts.en:
Mr. William lives in the house of his in-laws on Buenos Aires street on the Gran Poder area in the city of La Paz. He is 21 years old and lives with his wife and son. He works as a taxi diver with a car that he purchased with his savings. His wife works for her mother in a call center, where she earns a salary of Bs. 300. The loan that William is requesting will be used to purchase calling cards, CDs, batteries, and cell phone chargers, as his mother in-law gave him a position on the call center as a way to help them and increase his income. To clarify things, Cotel (where William works), is one of the telephone companies that operates in Bolivia and that offers franchise opportunities to small entrepreneurs that wish to open call centers for the public. This is the first time that William has asked for a loan through Kiva. The analysis of William's income flow shows that he has the capacity to repay the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jordan Shanker, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase calling cards, CDs, batteries, and cell phone chargers to sell

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es: La señora Blanca tiene 40 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos que son estudiantes, vive junto a su esposo, quien está de acuerdo con sus propósitos trazados. Ella se manifestó en el arte textil desde muy temprana edad, a razón de haber estudiado para ello. Aprendió en un principio empíricamente, sin embargo la experiencia y la práctica hacen de esta mujer una máquina de trabajo, ya que es muy solicitada por su buena labor, la que viene realizando desde hace 15 años, lo que le gusta de su actividad diaria es hacer sus prendas bien, le es rentable porque cuenta  con sus clientes desde hace tiempos y por recomendación, consigue aún más. Este es el segundo préstamo que tiene con MFP. Con el dinero solicitado quiere ampliar su taller textil e invertir en un nuevo negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Blanca, 40, has 3 school-age children. She lives with her husband who supports her plans. She has displayed skill in textile art from an early age, and has studied in this area. She learned empirically, and experience and practice have made this woman into a working machine. She is much sought-after for her work, which she has been doing for 15 years. What she likes best about her daily activity is making her garments well. This is profitable for her because she has long-term clients, and with recommendations, she is gaining even more. This is the second loan she has taken with MFP. With the money she wants to expand her textile workshop and invest in a new business.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expansion of her textile workshop

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es:
La señora Sandra S. es originaria del municipio de Nagarote de la ciudad de León donde se desempeña en su negocio de pulpería el cual es atendido en su propia casa de habitación donde le visitan sus clientes.

Ella es madre de dos hijos de los cuales uno de ellos se encuentra en edad escolar y por este motive ella debe suplir estos gastos y es importante decir que ella es el único sustento de su hogar y por esto se esfuerza cabalmente para lograr mejorar su nivel de vida y el de sus dos pequeños hijos. La razón por la cual ha acudido a Ceprodel es para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita la compra de los productos de pulpería para ofrecerlos y así continuar manteniendo su hogar y llevando el pan a su mesa.
texts.en:
Sandra Solis is from the municipality of Nagarote, in the city of Leon, where she runs a small grocery store out of her home. She has two young children, One of them is already in school, which generates additional expenses. Sandra is her home's only breadwinner, so she works very hard to improve the quality of life for her and her children. Sandra has approached Kiva partner Ceprodel looking for a loan that will allow her to restock her store with new products that she can offer to her customers, and continue to make her business grow to better support her family.

Translated from Spanish by Maria B., Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing products to restock small store

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria vive en casa propia en la calle Casto Arguedas de la zona de alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz con su hijo, la actividad que ella tiene desde hace varios años es la venta de productos lácteos cuyo proveedor es la fábrica de productos lacteos Pil; Maria tiene un Kiosco de ventas ubicado en la calle Indaburo de la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz, donce además de los productos lacteos, ella vende papas fritas, chicharroncitos, etc., para poder aumentar sus ingresos.

El crédito que solicita es para aumentar su capital de operaciones y comprar más mercadería tanto de PIL como los otros productos que vende. De esta manera planea aumentar sus ingresos.

Esta es la primera vez que solicita un crédito de IMPRO y también de Kiva. Por su actividad y por el carácter social  del crédito, además de contar con los ingresos necesarios para repagar el préstamo, Maria se hace merecedora de la oportunidad.
texts.en:
Mrs. María lives in her own home with her son on Casto Arguedas Street in the high neighborhood of San Pedro in the city of La Paz. She has worked for several years selling milk products, which she buys from her supplier Pil, a milk products factory. María has a kiosk located on Indaburo Street in the downtown area of La Paz, where she also sells french fries, chicharrones (fried pork), etc. in order to increase her income. She has requested this loan to increase her working capital and buy more merchandise both from Pil and other products that she sells. In this way she will increase her income. This is the first time she has requested a loan from IMPRO or from Kiva. Because of her business and the social character of the loan, as well as having sufficient income to repay the loan, she is deserving of this opportunity.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more milk products and other products to sell at her kiosk

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a member of the Sol Radiante (Brilliant Sun) Village Bank. She is 39 years old and married with three children. She sells women’s and children’s clothing by special order to her friends and acquaintances, and has been in this line of work for many years.

Elizabeth is requesting a loan of $500 (1500 soles) to travel to Lima to buy more clothing to fill her orders. Elizabeth has been a client of FINCA Peru for the past eight years. Her goal for the future is to open her own store to sell new, fashionable clothes as well as a variety of other items.

loans.use: Buy women's and children's clothing to fill custom orders

loans.name: Caren

texts.es: La señora Caren, de 31 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, vive con su esposo quien está de acuerdo con sus propósitos. La venta de productos de belleza es la actividad en la que desde hace cuatro años atrás la señora Caren se encaminó, ella deja sus productos al contado y al crédito, los que vende a través de un catálogo proporcionado por la línea de belleza. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que conocer mucha gente y muchos lugares, le es rentable porque desde sus inicias ha contado  con  un gran número de clientes que requieren de estos productos. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP. El dinero será invertido en la compra de una vitrina y más productos de belleza.
texts.en:
Mrs. Caren, 31 years old, is the mother of two children, lives with her husband who agrees with her proposal. selling beauty products is the activity which for four years Caren has engaged in. She gets her products on credit, which she sells from a catalog from the beauty line. What she likes about her work is that she knows a lot of people and a lot of places, which is beneficial because from the start she ha made contact with a large number of customers who require these products. This is the first time she is asking for a loan with MFP. The money will be invested in buying more beauty products.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying a larger quantity of products she sells

loans.name: Olena

texts.en:
For Olena, selling women’s clothing has been her first venture. She has successfully operated a sales kiosk for a year offering a variety of clothing. Olena has sought to create an atmosphere that encourages customers to come back to her kiosk. One of the ways she has tried to accomplish this is to consistently replenish their stock with newer products. Her current net profit amounts to around 5,000 Grivnas per month.

Olena is an entrepreneur who is full of life. Her ability to accomplish her goals makes her a solid client with Nadiya Ukraine. Her entrepreneurial spirit and good relationship with customers has helped place the business in a favorable position to grow. Olena has requested a loan to purchase additional clothing items. She wants to be prepared for what she hopes will be another busy and profitable winter season in Ukraine.

loans.use: To increase her profits

loans.name: Urcad 2 Group

texts.fr: L'Ecovillage de keur Goumak (http://www.sem-fund.org/keurgumaggfr.php) situé dans la région de Diourbel se particularise par l’absence d'infrastructures industrielles. Quand on sait que les conséquences de la désertification n'épargnent plus aucune couche sociale de la région qui est une zone rurale. C'est pourquoi, pour sauvegarder la bonne continuité de nos activités, nous les femmes de Urcad ayant bénéficié d'un premier prêt, viennent encore solliciter un renouvellement de prêt. Comme le nombre de personnes a augmenté dans le groupement, il est maintenant scindé en 02 groupes dont le groupe Urcad 1 faisant la transformation de fruits-légumes-céréales et l'autre groupe Urcad 2 faisant les activités de teinture
texts.en:
The ecovillage of keur Goumak (http://www.sem-fund.org/keurgumaggfr.php), located in the region of Diourbel, stands out because of its absence of industrial infrastructure. We all know that the consequences of desertification do not spare any social class of the region which is a rural zone. This is why, to safeguard the good stability of our activities, we, the women of Urcad, having received a first loan, are requesting a renewal of our loan. Since the number of group members has increased, the group has now been split up in 2 groups. Urcad 1 is in charge of the transformation of fruits-vegetables-cereals, the other group Urcad 2 is in the business of color dyeing.


Translated from French by Véronique Fourment, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of raw material for dyeing

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.en:
Carmen Rosa is a member of the Sol Radiante (Brilliant Sun) Village Bank. She is 35 years old and married with three children. She and her husband run a stand in a local market where they sell condiments, spices, and dried foods like peas, beans, and corn.

Carmen Rosa is requesting a loan of $500 (1500 PEN) to travel to Lima (about 9 hours from Ayacucho) to buy spices like cinnamon and garlic in bulk. Carmen Rosa has been working with FINCA Peru for six years. Her goal for the future is to open her own store so that she would not have to pay rent for a market stall.

loans.use: Buy cinnamon, garlic, and other spices wholesale to resell

loans.name: Carola

texts.es: Carola, de 27 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 2 añitos de edad. Ella es una mujer muy activa y con deseos de superación, se dedica desde hace un año atrás a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo, trabaja para una línea cosmética muy conocida a nivel nacional, lo que le gusta de su trabajo es dar una  su buena atención y ser amable con sus clientes. Le es rentable porque cuenta con sus clientes que le compran desde que se inicio en el negocio, le va muy bien. Es su primera solicitud de préstamo con MFP. Con la cantidad solicitada quiere implementarse comprando más productos, porque así se los dejan a un precio menor y al revenderlos pueda ver mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Carola, 27, lives with her husband and her 2-year-old son. A very active woman desiring to succeed, for the last year she has been selling catalog beauty products. She is working for a well-known national-level cosmetics line. What she enjoys about her work is attending and being agreeable to her clients. This is profitable for her because she has clients who have been buying since she started the business, so it is going well for her. This is her first loan request through MFP. She wants to start buying products in larger quantity, so she can buy them wholesale and earn more reselling them.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a larger stock of beauty products

loans.name: Vita

texts.en:
Vita operates a small business selling women’s clothes and footwear in Khoost, Ukraine. She has an attractively arranged little outdoor kiosk at the local market in her home town, where she carries all sorts of necessary items for ladies. Vita has been in business for about six years and has developed a stable, profitable enterprise based on products that are always in demand. Her business has become the main source of income for her, her husband Edward and two sons. She has been in the trade for 5 years.

Vita’s business is growing. She has requested a loan to increase her working capital and help boost the further development of her business.

Note: this is a short term loan that will be repaid in two months.

loans.use: To increase turnover capital

loans.name: Celfa

texts.es: La señora Celfa, de 23 años de edad, es madre de 2 hijos, y otro que viene en camino, vive con su conviviente, quien está de acuerdo con sus metas trazadas. Se dedica a la venta de ropa para niños y adultos, complementa su negocio con la venta de zapatos y otros accesorios para vestir. Sus prendas las deja a sus clientes al crédito o al contado, trabajo que viene realizando desde hace 2 años atrás. Ella trabaja muy duro, con la intención de sacar adelante a sus hijos y desde luego crecer con su negocio para adquirir más adelante su propia tienda. Le es rentable porque su ropa la lleva a vender por los caseríos (zonas rurales de los distritos), y le va muy bien porque no tiene competencia. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP. El dinero solicitado será usado en la comprar de ropa, posteriormente alquilará un local para poner su tienda.
texts.en:
Señora Celfa, 23, is the mother of 2 children with another on the way. She lives with her partner, who is supportive of her goals. She sells children's and adult clothing, and complements her business selling shoes and other apparel accessories. She leaves the garments with the clients on credit or cash, and has been doing this work for 2 years. She works really hard, intending to get her children ahead. For now she wants to grow her business so that later she can have her own shop. This is profitable for her because she takes her clothing around the villages (the rural areas of the districts) to sell, which does quite well for her because she has no competition. This is her first loan from MFP. She will use the money to buy clothing, and later she will rent a space for her own shop.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy more garments to increase her sales

loans.name: Moises

texts.es:
EL Sr. Moisés M., vive en la localidad de El Torno, en el departamento de Santa Cruz, Bolivia, vive en una pequeña casa en alquiler desde que enviudó hace algunos años. Es un joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante para poder seguir progresando económicamente.  
Se dedica al transporte en motocicleta, trabajando de lunes a domingo, paralelamente en sus tiempos libres se dedica al comercio de ganado vacuno; actividades que le dan el suficiente sustento para poder sobrevivir.
El monto solicitado en esta ocsión, servirá para la compra de una motocicleta nueva con la cual podrá trabajar más comodamente puesto que la anterior ya presentaba problemas mecánicos.
texts.en:
Senor Moisés M. lives in El Torno, Santa Cruz Department, Bolivia. He has lived in a small rented house since he became a widower some years ago. He is a young man eager to get ahead and continue to progress economically. He works in motorcycle transport, working from Monday to Sunday. In addition, in his free time he also engages in the cattle business. These activities provide him sufficient support to be able to survive. The amount requested this time is to buy a new motorcycle, with which he will be able to work more comfortably since his old one is already having mechanical problems.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Sanford, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of motorcycle

loans.name: Charito

texts.es: Charito, de 40 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive junto a sus 3 hijos que están estudiando y la apoyan en todo. Ella vende productos de belleza por catálogo de una línea cosmética muy reconocida a nivel nacional, desde hace 3 años. Estos productos los lleva a vender  por los diferentes lugares de Pucallpa, los deja al contado y al crédito. Charito  trabaja solo por las tardes, le gusta mucho su trabajo, ya que por medio del mismo conoce mucha gente y se relaciona con muchas personas. Le es rentable porque cuenta con una clientela selecta. A veces, tiene algunas dificultades con aquellas personas que incumplen con su pago. Ella se considera una mujer decidida y luchadora, pues lo que se propone lo cumple. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, por lo cual se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas. El dinero que solicita será usado en la compra de una vitrina para poner sus productos.
texts.en:
Charito, 40 years old, is a single mother, lives together with her 3 children who are studying and they support her in everything. She has sold beauty products from a cosmetic line very well recognized on a national level for three years. She takes these products to sell in different places in Pucallpa, and leaves them buy contact and by credit. Charito works alone in the afternoons, she likes her work a lot because of the same, she meets many people and she relates with many people. This is helpful because she counts on a select clientele. Sometimes, she has difficulties with some people who are incomplete with their payments. She considers herself a fighter and a dedicated woman, so that which she proposes she completes. This is her first loan with MFP, so she promises to be punctual with her payments. The money that she's asking for will be used to buy a cabinet to put her products in.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buying a case to display her products

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita C., a 50-year-old farmer and mother five from Sto. Nino, South Cotabato, is a graduate of BS Agriculture. Her husband inherited a 2-hectare rice field from his parents, which they farm as for their daily sustenance.

“Rice is a very important crop”, Teresita says/  They have farmed rice to ensure food on their table. The entire family helps with the crop so they don't have to hire laborers.

Teresita is requesting a loan to purchase sacks of fertilizers and chemicals increase the productivity of her farm

She hopes the higher yield will help her buy another hectare of land, and slowly produce enough rice to raise her family's living conditions. In her own words: "With this loan, surely I could hit my target yield in my farm and slowly, I will be able to realize all my dreams."

CEV has provided all its clients insurance benefits plus credit assistance and training for their well being.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of fertilizers and chemicals.

loans.name: Elma

texts.es: La señora Elma, de 33 años de edad, es madre de 5 hijos que están estudiando, vive con su conviviente, quien la apoya en todas sus decisiones. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida y bebidas desde hace 2 años atrás, y lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con sus clientes. Su le es muy rentable porque se encuentra ubicada en un lugar muy transitado, y cuenta con una clientela selecta que degustan de su buena sazón. No tiene dificultad alguna ya que le va muy bien, por ello quiero seguir creciendo con su negocio. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP. Quiere mandar a construir una ramada (espacio al aire libre, cubierto por un techo a base de palos y ramas) y ambientar adecuadamente para vender sus platos más tranquila y dar una mejor acogida a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Señora Elma, 33 years-old, is a mother of 5 children that are students. She lives with her partner, who supports her in all her decisions. She has been dedicated to the sale of food and beverages for 2 years, and what she likes about her work is the direct contact that she has with her clients. Her business is very profitable because it is found in a very well traveled location, and she relies on a select clientele that enjoy her good flavors. She does not have any difficulty since she does very well. Because of this she wants to continue growing her business. This is her second loan with MFP. She wants to have a patio built (a space outdoors, covered by a ceiling held up by poles and branches) and furnished adequately to sell her more tranquil dishes and to give a better atmosphere to her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Barbara (B) Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a patio for serving her food

loans.name: Luz Rebecca

texts.en:
“I always worry about how will I stretch our family budget to address all my family needs”, says Luz Rebecca A., a 52-year-old mother and CEV client from Talomo District, Davao City. She joined CEV and so she learn how to engage in business.

CEV helped her open a retail business where she sells variety of goods. She was able to get started with a small disability allowance received by her husband. Now that she has experienced initial success, she is requesting another loan from CEV to purchase more stock and to possibly expand into other income areas.

She has greatly benefited from the credit assistance, trainings and insurance benefits CEV offers its clients.

loans.use: To purchase more stock for a small commodity store

loans.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger M. is 40 years old, married, and one of the banana growers in Calinan District, Davao City. He began his banana farm in 1996 by renting a 1/-hectare piece of land. The produce was delivered to Minda Maing, a banana wholesaler and buyer in his town. During harvest, he hires workers to help him transport his produce to the area where he sells his produce. His wife and siblings help him run the business and have been thankful for CEV credit assistance to improve their yield.

He is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and seedlings. Bananas are his main crop and these products will help him produce more. He an active CEV client who has access to the credit assistance, trainings and insurance benefits the organization offers.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, insecticides and banana seedlings.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
“At first I was timid to invest and establish my own business”, says Evelyn R., a 52-year-old married mother of five children who lives in Talomo District, Davao City. She was hesitant to start her own business until CEV taught her how to operate her own business.

She sells rice, and she tries to earn the respect and trust of the people she sells to which helps promote her business. Evelyn said that being part of CEV help her develop skills and transformed her into a more sociable and vocal person."I deeply thank CEV for the trainings, and now I’m not afraid to speak out, which is really a big help considering that I need to market my product”.

She is requesting another loan from CEV so she can increase her inventory of rice, a main commodity in her area.

Like other CEV clients, she enjoys receiving credit assistance, trainings and Insurance coverage from the organization.

loans.use: To purchase more sacks of rice.

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida A. is 49 years old, married and has six children. She is from Bunawan, Agusan Del Sur and her husband is a farmer. They began as tenant workers of a small parcel of rice field, and this has been their main source of income ever since. Because this did not provide enough for the family's expenses, Zenaida opened a sari-sari store to help bring in extra income for the family.

Through hard work and determination, she was able to make enough money so they could buy their own rice field. She is requesting a loan so she can buy eight bags of fertilizer which will increase the rice yield and provide more profit.

She is been an active member of CEV since 2007, and she is very grateful to be able to take part in all that CEV offers. It has truly been a blessing in her life when times are very hard.

loans.use: To purchase 8 sacks of fertilizers for a rice field.

loans.name: Tusuubira Group B

texts.en:
Prossy N. is the leader of Tusuubira Group B.  She is 35 years old and is married with 4 children. Her previous loans have helped her so much with her tailoring business that her business has lasted for a long time.

Prossy has a shop that sells new clothes and clothes that she makes herself for her customers. She is so happy with her business. She also has a tailoring school where she teaches young girls the same trade. Her students have to pay a small amount of money to help her with the rent. 

Prossy needs a loan to buy more new clothes to sell and materials for making other clothes now that the demand is so high.

loans.use: Prossy will buy new clothes for her shop and materials she needs for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Haroldo

texts.es: El señor Haroldo tiene 45 años de edad, es padre de un hijo que estudia, vive junto a su esposa quien lo apoya mucho. Haroldo se dedica al transporte de pasajeros desde hace 3 años, gracias a su buena administración del dinero, ahora es propietario de dos motocarros, cuyas ganancias le ayudan a fortalecer un poco más su hogar. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con sus pasajeros, le es muy rentable porque sus vehículos solo trabajan bajo contrato con cualquier institución, razón por la cual le va muy bien. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP. Con este dinero quiere comprar repuestos, para mandar a reparar sus motocarros.
texts.en:
Mr. Haroldo is 45 years old, father of a son who is a student, and lives alongside his wife who is very supportive. Haroldo has worked transporting passengers for 3 years, and thanks to his good money management skills, he is now the owner of two moto-taxis and he has used the earnings to improve his home. He likes his job because he is able to interact directly with his passengers. It is a very profitable business because he only drives under contract with certain businesses, and for that reason the business is going very well. This is the first time he has requested a loan from Kiva partner MFP (Microfinanzas PRISMA). He will buy spare parts for his moto-taxis with the loan, and then have someone repair them.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy spare parts for his moto-taxis

loans.name: Tusuubira Group A

texts.en:
Prossy is a 38-year-old married mother of five children, ages 6 - 16, and the foster mother of her orphaned niece.  She has owned and operated a retail grocery shop for 8 years. Before she became a member of this borrowing group 6 years ago, Prossy's shop did not have enough goods to sell, due to insufficient capital, which restricted the income that she needed to provide for her family. 

Now, with loans, she is able to buy more stock, which improves her revenue. With the increased income from her shop and her savings, Prossy and her husband hope to buy another plot of land and build rental homes as an additional source of family income.

loans.use: Purchase sugar, flour, cooking oil and other stock for her grocery store

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La Sra. Lidia R. vive en la localidad de La Guardia, en el departamento de Santa Cruz, Bolivia, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos. Si bien vive en casa propia, las condiciones en la que vive son muy humildes, pero se las arreglan todos juntos para llevar un hogar feliz.
La actividad a la que se dedica es la venta de abarrotes que realiza en su pequeña tienda general la cual se encuentra en su domicilio, su esposo es chofer de taxi y trabaja en el centro de la cuidad de Santa Cruz.
Con el crédito quiere aumentar su capital de trabajo para así agrandar un poco mas la tiendita.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lidia R. lives in the La Guardia neighborhood, in the department of Santa Cruz, Bolivia. She has her own home and lives with her husband and three children. She is lucky to have her own home, and although the conditions are very humble, everyone gets together to make a happy household. She works selling groceries from a small general store in her home. Her husband is a taxi driver and works in downtown Santa Cruz. With this loan she wants to increase her working capital to enlarge her small store.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Enlarge general store

loans.name: Ilmer

texts.es: Ilmer tiene 57 años de edad, y ha sido madre de 6 hijos, los mismos que ya son independientes y de familia, es madre soltera y en la actualidad vive con uno de sus hijos quien la apoya en todo. Ella se dedica a la venta de comida, por las mañanas y las tardes dentro de su vivienda, esta labor la viene realizando desde hace 3 años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que mucha gente degusta de su buena sazón, le es rentable, ya que la zona donde tiene su negocio es muy transitada y concurrida. Lo que le es un poco difícil es no contar con los ambientes necesarios para atender a sus clientes. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero solicitado mandará a ampliar su negocio, ambientarlo como es debido, para dar una mejor acogida a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ilmer is 57 years old and mother of 6 children. They are all independent and have families now. She is single and currently lives with one of her children, who supports her in everything she does. Ilmer works selling food in the mornings and afternoons from her home, which she has been doing for 3 years now. She likes that while she works many people can taste her delicious flavors. It is a profitable business as the area where her business is located is well traveled and attracts large crowds. It is a little difficult for her to not have a good place for her to serve her customers. This is her second loan from Kiva partner MFP (Microfinanzas PRISMA). With this loan she will expand her business and will make the environment more comfortable for her customers so they will feel welcome.

Translated from Spanish by Laura Westin, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand and make restaurant more comfortable for customers

loans.name: Janeth

texts.es: Janeth, de 33 años de edad, vive son su conviviente y sus tres hijos. Vender comida es la actividad diaria que tiene la señora Janeth, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 4 años, sus esfuerzos por prosperar y crecer en su negocio son motivados por sus tres hijos a quienes solventa sus gastos escolares. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es dar una buena atención a sus clientes y preparar bien la comida a vender, para que los mismos se sientan satisfechos. Le es rentable porque es la única persona que vende comida por su zona. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero solicitado comprará sillas y mesas, para dar una mejor comodidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Janeth is 33 years old and lives with her common-law husband and their three children. Ms Janeth makes a living selling food; she has had this business for the past 4 years. Her efforts to have her business thrive and expand are motivated by her three children, whose education she is responsible for paying. What she enjoys most in her work is giving good customer service to her clients and preparing good food to sell, so that her clients are satisfied. Her business is profitable because she is the only person selling food in her area. This is her first loan with MFP. With the loan she is requesting, she will buy chairs and tables, so that her customers will be more comfortable.

Translated from Spanish by Laure Kwon, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy chairs and tables for her small restaurant.

loans.name: Magner

texts.es: Magner, de estado civil soltero, tiene 27 años de edad, vive junto a su hermana en forma independiente. Es propietario de un motocarro, en el mismo se dedica al transporte de pasajeros por las distintas zonas de su ciudad, esto desde hace 2 años atrás. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es entablar relación y dar un buen trato a sus pasajeros, le es muy rentable este trabajo, ya que el mismo lo administra y tiene ganancias diarias, y al ser soltero no tiene muchas responsabilidades por el momento; por lo que le va bien laboral y personalmente. Es su segundo préstamo con MFP. Con el dinero quiere mandar a reparar su vehículo, así como también comprar piezas para armar, el mismo, otro motocarro.
texts.en:
Magner is single and is 27 years old and he lives with with his sister but in an independent way. He owns a motorbike-car in which he transports passengers to and from different zones in the city. He has been doing this for 2 years. What he likes about his work is that he can have a good relationship with his clients and treat them well. His job is very profitable as he administrates it himself and he earns each day, and as he is single he does not yet have many responsibilities; this is why he is doing well in his job and personally. This is his second loan with MFP. With the money he wants to send his vehicle to be repaired as well as buying parts so that he can put another one together.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To repair his motorbike-car as well as buying parts to put together another one/Reparación de su motocarro, además de comprar piezas para poder armar otro

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Maria tiene 23 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo de 2 añitos,  quien es su inspiración para salir adelante. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo de una línea cosmética muy reconocida a nivel nacional,  en sus distintas variedades (perfumes, talcos, cremas y otros), estos productos los lleva a vender por las diferentes zonas de Pucallpa, los deja al contado o al crédito, trabaja solo por horas, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 2 años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que conoce mucha gente con la cual socializa y también conoce muchos lugares. Su trabajo le genera buenos ingresos y le va muy bien.  Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, donde se mantuvo puntual en sus cuotas. Ahora quiere comprar más productos de belleza, además de una vitrina para tenerlos más seguros y mejor exhibidos.
texts.en:
Maria is 23 years old and she lives with her husband and their little 2 year old son, who is her inspiration to move on. She sells a line of very nationally well-known beauty products from catalogs in all their varieties (perfumes, talks, cremes, and other things). She brings these products to the different zones of Pucallpa where she sells them on credit or with an I.O.U. She works alone for hours, and she has been doing this for 2 years. What she likes about her work is that she gets to know a lot of the people and the places that she goes to. Her work is quite profitable and she is doing well. This is her second loan through MFP where she has been punctual with her repayments. She now wants to buy more beauty products as well as a display cabinet so that they will be more secure and better shown off.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a display case for her beauty products/Compra de una vitrina para sus productos de belleza

loans.name: Kiri Ewala Group

texts.en:
K. Mastula is the chairperson of Kiri Ewala loan group in Katwe, Uganda. She is a very hard-working lady who has a business selling mattresses and beds, both metallic and wooden, to her customers from her rented space in Katwe. She has had the business for over 25 years. Ever since she joined her lending group in 1978, the loans have pulled her through, and this time around, she wants to buy more mattresses from the factory for sale. 

Mastula is a single mother of 4 children who are all in school. She is also the caretaker for her late sister's child. Her lending group is so good that she says she has no plan of ever deserting it.

loans.use: Mastula will buy more mattresses to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La señora Maria, de 56 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su único hijo que es soltero y la apoya en su negocio. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de productos de pan llevar (maíz, plátanos, yucas, entre otras, de mucho consumo), vende de manera ambulante en un mercado de su localidad, esta labor la viene realizando desde hace un año atrás. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con el público, y le es rentable, porque nos cuenta que sus productos se venden como el pan caliente diariamente. Es la primera vez que solicita un préstamo con MFP. El dinero será invertido en la compra de más productos de pan llevar y para alquilar un puesto estable en el mercado donde vende.
texts.en:
Maria is 56 years old and she lives with her husband and their only son who is single and supports the business. She dedicates herself to buying and selling take-away bread produce (maize, plantain, yuca among others that are eaten a lot). She is a wandering saleswoman in her local market and she has been doing this for 1 year. What she likes about her work is the direct contact that she has with the public and that it is profitable as she tells us that her products sell like hot cakes each day. It is the first time that she has asked for a loan through MFP. The money will be invested in buying more bread produce and to rent a stable stall in the market where she sells.


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the amount of produce that she sells as well as renting a stable stall in the market/Incrementar la cantidad de productos que vende, además de alquilar un puesto estable en el mercado

loans.name: Huk Sunqulla Group

texts.en:
The Huk SunqulL. ("One Heart" in Quechua) Village Bank is maD. up of fifteen women from the Paucará community of Acobamba Province in central Peru. Paucará is located about 3200 meters above sea level and is mostly flat, with a chilly climate suited to to grow grains and tubers. Most members of the community are dedicated to raising livestock or farming, while others sell merchandise in local markets. 

Norma and Martina are two members of Huk SunqulL..

Norma is married with three children who are 12, 8 and 5 years old and are all currently in school. Norma is a schoolteacher, but she is not paid enough to live on, so she also sells dry goods (rice, sugar, flour) at the local Sunday market. When she first started it was tough, since people gossiped about her having to have two jobs, but she says she has gotten past that. In the beginning, her husband didn't want to let her go out to the market to work as a vendor, but once he realized she was earning money he started to help her. Today, Norma says that her business has grown a lot since she started working with FINCA, and her husband is now very understanding. She has developed a better relationship with her family, too. Norma is requesting a loan of 600 soles (US$200) to buy a wider variety of merchandise to sell at her market stall. Norma's dream is to buy a car and for her children to graduate with professional degrees. 

Martina is married with two children who are 18 and 12 years old. Martina sells lamb soup and chicken soup in local markets, and also sells at meetings of the "Juntos" program. She has increased her sales since she started selling soup at these meetings, since she used to just work at markets. Martina is requesting a loan of 600 soles to buy more lamb to make soup to bring to other local markets. She says that FINCA has taught her good values and how to be responsible with herself and her family. Her dream in life is to build her own house and to open her own store.

loans.use: Buy lamb, dry goods

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La señora Maria, de 47 años de edad vive con su esposo y dos de sus seis hijos. Su dedicación a la venta de comida hicieron que construyera en su propio domicilio su pequeño restaurante, por la misma razón que sus clientes se lo pidieron, con su buena atención y sazón, se gano el cariño y respeto de sus comensales. Esta actividad la viene realizando desde hace 2 años, lo que le gusta de su trabajo es cocinar bien para que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos. Le es rentable, ya que se encuentra ubicada en una buena zona, muy transitada, le va muy bien. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita en un préstamo con MFP. Con este dinero quiere mandar a refaccionar algunas imperfecciones de su local, así como también, comprar utensilios de cocina (ollas, platos, entre otros).
texts.en:
Maria is 47 years old and she lives with her husband and two of their six children. Her dedication to selling food meant that they built their own small restaurant in their house. Her clients asked for this as she earns their fondness and respect as she offers good customer service and good seasoning. She has been doing this for two years and what she likes about her job is that cooking well satisfies her clients. It is profitable as it is located in a good area which many people pass through, and it is going well for her. This is the second time that she has asked for a loan through MFP. With this money she wants to make over some parts of her store as well as buying kitchen utensils (pots, plates among other things).


Translated from Spanish by Liz Harvey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To refurbish her store and buy kitchen utensils/Refaccionar su local y comprar utensilios de cocina

loans.name: Elshan

texts.en: Elshan was born in 1980. He is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP) from the Armenian-occupied territory of Azerbaijan, Fuzuli town, settled in the Fuzuli region, Dilagarda village. He is married with 2 children. This man has been in the taxi business for 5 years. Now, he needs a loan to buy spare parts.

loans.use: To buy spare parts

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es: La señora Marilin a sus 34 años de edad, es madre 2 hijos que estudian y son su razón de salir adelante, vive junto a su conviviente quien también la apoya mucho. Es una mujer muy activa y con deseos de superación, se dedica desde hace 2 años a la venta de productos de belleza como: perfumes, joyas, talcos, lápiz labiales, cremas, y otras variedades por catálogo. Le es rentable, porque gracias a su carisma y jovialidad al vender, se ha ganado una gran gama de clientes. Estos productos los lleva a vender por las zonas más alejadas de Yarinacocha, los deja al crédito o al contado. Trabaja todo el día y se siente bien con su labor, ya que conoce a mucha gente.
